title: Must Read: Duran Lantink Wins 2025 International Woolmark Prize, Trump's Tariffs Rock Fashion's Supply Chain
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Thursday. Designer Duran Lantink won the 2025 International Woolmark Prize, which includes a cash prize of AUD $300,000 (about $191,217 USD) to invest in the development of his business.
